languages.text: Загадочная сущность, именуемая некоторыми Королем Искажений, даровала немалую силу своему герольду в том противостоянии. Порой Вольному Торговцу сопутствовала немыслимая фортуна, сопровождавшаяся удивительными расхождениями в воспоминаниях очевидцев — в то время, как одни помнили имевшие место события, другие хранили в памяти образы совсем других, куда менее удачные для Лорд-капитана стечения обстоятельств. Но мало ли глупцов и безумцев в Просторе?

A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?
languages.original_text: Загадочная сущность, именуемая некоторыми Королем Искажений, даровала немалую силу своему герольду в том противостоянии. Порой Вольному Торговцу сопутствовала немыслимая фортуна, сопровождавшаяся удивительными расхождениями в воспоминаниях очевидцев — в то время, как одни помнили имевшие место события, другие хранили в памяти образы совсем других, куда менее удачные для Лорд-капитана стечения обстоятельств. Но мало ли глупцов и безумцев в Просторе?

traits.locale_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck, that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of witnesses. While some remembered the events as they actually transpired, the others held in their memories images of different circumstances, much more unfavourable for the Lord Captain. But who is to say that the Expanse isn't filled with fools and madmen?

A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck, that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of witnesses. While some remembered the events as they actually transpired, the others held in their memories images of different circumstances, much more unfavourable for the Lord Captain. But who is to say that the Expanse isn't filled with fools and madmen?

Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses. While some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses. While some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

languages.text: 在这场冲突之中，被一部分人称为“扭曲之王”的神秘实体赋予了它的先驱无与伦比的力量。有的时候，行商浪人的运气会好得难以置信，而在这种时候，现场目击者的记忆总是会出现古怪的偏差。有些人还能记得事情发生的原貌，而另一些人则会回想起截然不同的情况，而且这些情况对领主舰长极其不利。不过，科罗努斯扩区从来不缺白痴和疯子，不是吗？
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: 在这场冲突之中，被一部分人称为“扭曲之王”的神秘实体赋予了它的先驱无与伦比的力量。有的时候，行商浪人的运气会好得难以置信，而在这种时候，现场目击者的记忆总是会出现古怪的偏差。有些人还能记得事情发生的原貌，而另一些人则会回想起截然不同的情况，而且这些情况对领主舰长极其不利。不过，科罗努斯扩区从来不缺白痴和疯子，不是吗？

languages.text: Ein mysteriöses Wesen, das manche den König der Entstellung nennen, gewährte seinem Herold in diesem Konflikt gewaltige Macht. Manchmal hatte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unglaubliches Glück gepaart mit merkwürdigen Diskrepanzen im Gedächtnis der Zeugen desselben. Einige erinnerten sich an die Ereignisse, wie sie tatsächlich stattgefunden hatten. Andere erinnerten sich aber an andere Umstände, die für den Lord Captain deutlich weniger positiv waren. Aber in der Ausdehnung wimmelt es nun mal von Wahnsinnigen, nicht wahr?
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: Ein mysteriöses Wesen, das manche den König der Entstellung nennen, gewährte seinem Herold in diesem Konflikt gewaltige Macht. Manchmal hatte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unglaubliches Glück gepaart mit merkwürdigen Diskrepanzen im Gedächtnis der Zeugen desselben. Einige erinnerten sich an die Ereignisse, wie sie tatsächlich stattgefunden hatten. Andere erinnerten sich aber an andere Umstände, die für den Lord Captain deutlich weniger positiv waren. Aber in der Ausdehnung wimmelt es nun mal von Wahnsinnigen, nicht wahr?

languages.text: Une entité mystérieuse, désignée par certains sous le nom de Roi de la Distorsion, accorda un immense pouvoir à son héraut. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} eut parfois une chance incroyable au cours de ce conflit, mais d'étranges divergences dans les souvenirs des témoins se produisirent à chacune de ces occasions. Certains se rappelaient les événements tels qu'ils s'étaient produits, tandis que d'autres auraient pu jurer que les circonstances étaient bien moins favorables {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Mais les Étendues sont peuplées de fous et de dupes...
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: Une entité mystérieuse, désignée par certains sous le nom de Roi de la Distorsion, accorda un immense pouvoir à son héraut. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} eut parfois une chance incroyable au cours de ce conflit, mais d'étranges divergences dans les souvenirs des témoins se produisirent à chacune de ces occasions. Certains se rappelaient les événements tels qu'ils s'étaient produits, tandis que d'autres auraient pu jurer que les circonstances étaient bien moins favorables {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Mais les Étendues sont peuplées de fous et de dupes...

languages.text: Una entidad misteriosa, conocida en algunos círculos como el Rey de la Distorsión, proporcionó un poder inmenso a su heraldo en este conflicto. En ocasiones, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente disfrutó de una suerte inexplicable acompañada de curiosas discrepancias en los recuerdos de los testigos. Aunque algunos recordaban los eventos tal y como habían sucedido, otros aseguraban haber presenciado otras circunstancias mucho menos favorables para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Bien es sabido que la Extensión está llena de locos e idiotas, ¿no?
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: Una entidad misteriosa, conocida en algunos círculos como el Rey de la Distorsión, proporcionó un poder inmenso a su heraldo en este conflicto. En ocasiones, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente disfrutó de una suerte inexplicable acompañada de curiosas discrepancias en los recuerdos de los testigos. Aunque algunos recordaban los eventos tal y como habían sucedido, otros aseguraban haber presenciado otras circunstancias mucho menos favorables para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Bien es sabido que la Extensión está llena de locos e idiotas, ¿no?

languages.text: ディストーションの王とも称される謎の実体が、今回の争いの中で使者に強大な力を授けた。自由開拓者は時に信じがたい僥倖に恵まれることもあったが、目撃者の間ではそれに併せて奇妙な記憶の食い違いが見られた。出来事をありのままに覚えている者もいれば、ロード・キャプテンにとってはあまり好ましくない、異なる状況を回顧する者もあった。それにしても、エクスパンスには愚者や狂人があふれているのだろうか？
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: ディストーションの王とも称される謎の実体が、今回の争いの中で使者に強大な力を授けた。自由開拓者は時に信じがたい僥倖に恵まれることもあったが、目撃者の間ではそれに併せて奇妙な記憶の食い違いが見られた。出来事をありのままに覚えている者もいれば、ロード・キャプテンにとってはあまり好ましくない、異なる状況を回顧する者もあった。それにしても、エクスパンスには愚者や狂人があふれているのだろうか？

languages.text: Bazılarının Bozunum Kralı diye hitap ettiği gizemli bir varlık, bu çatışmada habercisine muazzam bir güç ihsan etti. Hür Tacir'in şansı bazen inanılmaz yaver gidiyor, yaşadıklarına şahit olanların hafızalarında tuhaf tutarsızlıklar meydana geliyordu. Bazıları her şeyi olduğu gibi hatırlarken bazıları da Lord Kaptan'ın hiç de faydasına olmayan farklı durumları anımsıyordu. Gelgelelim Enginlik, akılsızlarla ve delilerle doludur...
languages.original_text: A mysterious entity, referred to by some as the King of Distortion, granted immense power to its herald in this conflict. Sometimes the Rogue Trader was stuck with incredible luck that was accompanied by strange discrepancies in the memories of its witnesses — while some remembered events as they actually transpired, others recalled different circumstances, much less favourable to the Lord Captain. But the Expanse is filled with fools and madmen, is it not?

traits.locale_text: Bazılarının Bozulum Kralı diye hitap ettiği gizemli bir varlık, bu çatışmada habercisine muazzam bir güç ihsan etti. Hür Tacir bazen inanılmaz bir şans sergiliyordu ve yaşadıklarına şahit olanların hafızalarında tuhaf tutarsızlıklar meydana geliyordu. Bazıları olan olayları olduğu gibi hatırlarken, bazıları da Lord Kaptan'ın hiç de faydasına olmayan farklı durumların söz konusu olduğunu anımsıyordu. Ama Enginlik sersemlerle ve delilerle doludur zaten, değil mi?
